title: WTB T206 commons SGC 60/5 -- just starting
author: 36GoudeyMan

posts.post_title: WTB T206 commons SGC 60/5 -- just starting
posts.post_content:
I thought I'd try my hand at the monster, albeit slowly and steadily (is there any other realistic way??).

I'v picked up a few SGC 60/5 EX commons/common backs, in the $85-90 range, and I'd like to get a few more, see how that goes before embarking further on the commitment.

If you've got some T206 commons in SGC 60/5 and would be willing to part with them for $85-90 incl. shipping (for Paypal, no fee to you), please let me know.  If this seems like unreasonable low-balling, I apologize, but I am going by what I've picked up already and I think I'm at least minimally in the zone.

PM me here.

Thanks!!
PM sent with scans of Sheckard, Maddox and Raymond.
